name: delete_task
description: Permanently delete a task. Use this when user wants to remove, delete, or get rid of a task. ALWAYS confirm with user before calling this tool.

user_id.description: ID of the user who owns the task (auto-injected by agent)

task_id.description: ID of the task to permanently delete

status.description: Confirmation that task was permanently deleted

title.description: Title of the deleted task (for confirmation message)

errors.message: Task not found or does not belong to user

usage_patterns: User says: 'Delete task 5' → FIRST ask 'Are you sure you want to delete task 5?', THEN call tool if confirmed
User says: 'Remove the groceries task' → find task matching 'groceries', ask for confirmation, then delete
User says: 'Get rid of completed tasks' → ask 'Do you want to delete all completed tasks?', confirm before batch operation
important_notes: DESTRUCTIVE OPERATION - This action cannot be undone
Agent MUST ask for explicit user confirmation before calling this tool
Example confirmation: 'Are you sure you want to delete [task title]? This cannot be undone.'
Only call tool after user confirms with 'yes', 'confirm', 'delete it', or similar affirmative response
If user says 'no', 'cancel', 'nevermind', DO NOT call the tool
